scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:services && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:services: npm install --workspace=services/api-gateway && npm install --workspace=services/user-service && npm install --workspace=services/message-service
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:message" "npm run dev:ai" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:services && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:services: npm run build --workspace=services/api-gateway && npm run build --workspace=services/user-service && npm run build --workspace=services/message-service
scripts.test:all: npm run test --workspace=services/api-gateway && npm run test --workspace=services/user-service && npm run test --workspace=services/message-service && npm run test --workspace=frontend
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint --workspace=services/api-gateway && npm run lint --workspace=services/user-service && npm run lint --workspace=services/message-service && npm run lint --workspace=frontend
